metadata.title: CVE-2005-1514 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: commands.c in qmail, when running on 64 bit platforms with a large amountof virtual memory, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service andpossibly execute arbitrary code via a long SMTP command without a spacecharacter, which causes an array to be referenced with a negative index.

criterions.comment: netqmail: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
